cards.title: Starstone
powers: Reduce damage dealt to targets in your play area by 1 until the start of your turn.
incapacitatedAbilities: One hero may use a power.
One player may play a card.
Select a hero target. Reduce all damage taken by that target by 1 until the start of your next turn.

openingLines.default: I've changed my ways, you'll see!
openingLines.GuardiansOfTomorrow.DelugeCharacter: We'll see about that, you watery witch!
openingLines.OblivAeonFrontPageCharacter: I guess running away isn't an option? Then you're going down hard, big guy.

cards.title: Igneous Shield
cards.body: When a hero target would be dealt damage, you may redirect it to this card.
cards.flavorText: You guys don't really expect me to come{br}up with rock puns for all these, do you?

cards.title: Shard Storm
powers: This card deals 1 target 1 projectile damage 3 times

flavorQuotes.text: You should consider toning back the enthusiasm for violence a little.

cards.title: Granite Fists
powers: {Starstone} deals up to 2 targets 2 melee damage each. You may destroy a stone. If you do, draw 2 cards.
cards.flavorText: You shouldn't be standing there if you{br}don't want to get punched!

cards.title: Swarming Splinters
powers: {Starstone} deals 1 target 1 melee damage. You may play a stone.

flavorQuotes.text: It's much worse for them than it is for me.

cards.title: Violent Detonation
cards.body: Whenever a stone is destroyed, {Starstone} deals each non-hero target 1 projectile damage
cards.flavorText: Didn't see that coming, did you!?

cards.title: Sentry Pillar
cards.body: The first time each turn a stone or {Starstone} takes damage from a non-hero target, this card deals the source of that damage 2 projectile damage.
cards.flavorText: Stop taking chunks out of the sidewalk!

cards.title: Reabsorb
cards.body: Destroy a stone. If you do, {Starstone} and each stone regains 2 HP. Draw a card
cards.flavorText: Now that's what I call recycling!

cards.title: Shatter
cards.body: You may destroy a stone. If you do, {Starstone} deals up to 4 targets 2 projectile damage each.
cards.flavorText: You want to break it? Fine. Broken.

cards.title: Draw Material
cards.body: You may destroy an Ongoing or Environment card. Put up to 2 stones from your trash into your hand.
cards.flavorText: On Earth or on Mars, stone still bends{br}to my will.

cards.title: Stoneshape
cards.body: Return a stone from play to your hand. Play a stone. That stone deals 1 target 4 melee damage.
cards.flavorText: Don't think I can't see you over there,{br}trying to get one over one me.

cards.title: Fragment Storm
cards.body: Select a target. Starstone and each stone deal that target 2 melee damage each.
cards.flavorText: What are you going to do, throw pebbles{br}at me?

cards.title: Crushing Stones
cards.body: One stone deals one target melee damage equal to its current HP.
cards.flavorText: Somebody get this rock off of my foot!{br}Now!

cards.title: Hammer Blow
cards.body: {Starstone} deals 1 target 5 melee damage. {Starstone} may deal herself 2 melee damage. If damage is taken this way, you may play a stone.

cards.title: Metamorphic Armor
cards.body: Reduce damage dealt to {Starstone} by the number of Stones in play. When this enters play, move a stone from your trash to your hand. At the start of your turn, destroy this card.
cards.flavorText: Was that an insult? Lucky for you, I have{br}thick skin.

cards.title: Rock and Roll
cards.body: {Starstone} deals each non-hero target 1 melee damage. You may move a stone from your trash to your hand
cards.flavorText: Any property damage is gravity's fault,{br}not mine.

promoCards.title: Starstone
powers: {Starstone} deals herself 1 melee damage. If she takes damage this way, move a stone from your trash into play.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may draw a card.
Put a non-character, non-indestructible villain card in play on top of its owner's deck

openingLines.default: I won't take this second chance for granite!
openingLines.GuardiansOfTomorrow.DelugeCharacter: The only way out is through! Follow me!
openingLines.OblivAeonFrontPageCharacter: Looks like we're stuck between a rock and a hard place!
